name: Viva La Summet Demo
description:
Viva La Summet is a GameBoy styled game where you take control of a young character whose dream is to be the greatest mountain climber ever. In this demo, you get to explore a small town and a fun little cave with some small puzzles to overcome. 

The game has been on hold due to a lack of audio support. GB files take a certain type of audio file that we don't quite understand yet, and so it's been put on the back burner while we work on some bigger projects. 

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move/Select

A - B Button

S - A Button
